imdb.plot outline: Ray weighs twenty-nine stone and without some drastic changes will probably not live to see his sons reach adulthood. Ray weighs twenty-nine stone and without some drastic changes will probably not live to see his sons reach adulthood. Saving Ray is a brand new four-part documentary series that follows Ray Adamson, a 31-year-old, morbidly obese man from Dublin, who is on a 12 week journey to turn his life around before his wedding day. Ray is just a normal guy. Like most of us, he splits his time between his job, his two young sons and his bride-to-be, Tracey. Unlike most of us, Ray weighs twenty-nine stone and without some drastic changes will probably not live to see his boys reach adulthood.
